""" UDF cz_sas_fuzz """

from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import DoubleType


@udf(returnType=DoubleType())
def cz_sas_fuzz(x):
    """UDF cz_sas_fuzz"""
    # pylint: disable=import-outside-toplevel
    import math

    if math.fabs(x) < 1e-12:
        return 0
    return x
